description: The ``opc_compute_security_rule`` resource creates and manages a security rule in an Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Compute Classic identity domain.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Acl.description: Name of the ACL that contains this security rule.

Description.description: A description of the security rule.

DstIpAddressPrefixes.description: List of IP address prefix set names to match the packet's destination IP address.

DstVnicSet.description: Name of virtual NIC set containing the packet's destination virtual NIC.

FlowDirection.description: Specify the direction of flow of traffic, which is relative to the instances, for this security rule. Allowed values are ingress or egress.

Name.description: The name of the security rule.

SecurityProtocols.description: List of security protocol object names to match the packet's protocol and port.

SrcIpAddressPrefixes.description: List of names of IP address prefix set to match the packet's source IP address.

SrcVnicSet.description: Name of virtual NIC set containing the packet's source virtual NIC.

Tags.description: List of tags that may be applied to the security rule.
